steps.title: How does it work?
steps.step1Description: Download the Chrome extension and sign in. It's free!
steps.step2Description: Open 3 emails you wrote to a contact in your "Sent" folder.

demo.title: Your style, your tone
demo.description: Fit my mail doesn't generate generic replies. It learns how you write to each contact:

demo.feature2: Your expressions, your punctuation, your signature
demo.feature3: Editable before sending, you stay in control

styles.title: Two types of styles
styles.subtitle: Fit my mail adapts to how you communicate with each person.

generic.title: Generic Style
generic.description: Your default writing style, used for all your contacts. Scan a few emails you've sent and the AI will learn your general tone.

perContact.title: Per-Contact Style
perContact.description: A specific style for each contact. Scan emails sent to a particular person and the AI will adapt the tone specifically for them.
perContact.feature1: Formal with clients, casual with friends
perContact.feature2: More precise than the generic style
perContact.feature3: Takes priority over the generic style

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: 3 emails allow the AI to reliably understand your writing style: your tone, favorite expressions, and level of formality. Fewer would be insufficient, more would be tedious.
faq.a2: Yes. We only store anonymized "snippets" of your writing style, never the full content of your emails. Your data is never shared.
faq.q3: Does it work in multiple languages?
faq.a3: Absolutely! Fit my mail works in all languages. The AI adapts to the language you use with each contact.
faq.a4: The free plan allows 1 contact. For unlimited contacts, upgrade to the PRO plan at €7/month.
faq.q5: Does it work on Firefox or Safari?
faq.a5: For now, Fit my mail is only available on Google Chrome. Other browsers coming soon!

faq.q1: Can I cancel at any time?
faq.a1: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll keep access until the end of the paid period.
faq.q2: How does the contact limit work?
faq.a2: Each contact represents a person for whom you've saved writing style examples. The free plan allows 1 contact, the Premium plan offers unlimited contacts.
faq.a3: Yes, all payments are processed by Stripe, the world leader in online payments. We never store your banking information.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: The privacy of your data is the absolute priority of Fit my mail. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our Chrome extension and web application.

section2.title: 2. Data we collect
section2.intro: We limit collection to data strictly necessary for the service to function:
section2.item1: Account information: Your email address and password (stored encrypted/hashed).
section2.item2: Learning data (Snippets): The content of emails you choose to manually scan via the extension. These texts are only used to create your style profile.
section2.item3: Technical data: Session cookies to maintain your connection.

section3.title: 3. How we use your data
section3.intro: Your data is used exclusively to:
section3.item1: Allow you to log in to your account.
section3.item2: Train the artificial intelligence to recognize and mimic your personal writing style.
section3.item3: Generate reply drafts in Gmail (the context of the received email is processed ephemerally for generation and is not stored permanently).

section4.title: 4. Security and Storage
section4.intro: The security of your data is paramount:
section4.item1: Your passwords are encrypted (hashed) and never stored in plain text.
section4.item2: Communications between the extension and our servers are encrypted via HTTPS (TLS).
section4.item3: Your data is never sold to third parties.

section5.title: 5. Your rights (GDPR)
section5.content: Under the GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, and delete your data. You can delete your saved styles (snippets) directly from your Dashboard. To permanently delete your account and all associated data, please contact us.

section6.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, you can contact us at:
